item.title: Income Inequalities
item.description: Over the last few years, LinkedIn has transformed into an interesting product. In its heyday I viewed it as a medium to connect with colleagues and search for jobs. But now it’s a full-blown social media platform for professionals and influencers (love this term). Love it, hate it but sometimes you come across great articles like the one I read today. It’s written by David Ellis and here is a link to the article.
